Name: welcome to heaven
About the game: welcome to heaven is a game about my disillusion with religion. Heaven is a monument to many of the sprouting problems. I can't help but read it cynically, it's so shabby. All of the 'Good' people who accept the lord will go up, and all the 'Bad' people who don't, will not. I see no love or compassion. And so, judge sinners and decide who is worthy of entrance. There are two possible endings. No one is without sin.
